title: The dumbest thing Riot has ever done...What the actualt FK
body:
Riot has now made the xp to get to level 30 (max level) half, so why has this screwed up League forever?

Its now super fast for people to make smurfs and get them to level 30
Toxic 12ives / kids can easil make another account after they get banned, get to 30 fast then troll, feed in ranked game
Newbies will be able to play ranked right off the bat and not the the necessary experiance or skills

Riot. What. The. Actual. FK. Where. You. Thinking

replies.body:
They were thinking, "lets make our game more accessible to casual players". If you read the patch notes, they explain in the paragraph above the change.

The old system, you need to play 350+ games to reach level 30. Thats like over 100 hours of playing just to get level 30.

I do agree it will mainly just lead to more smurfs, but i really don't care. Don't see a problem with smurfs. Smurf doesn't mean "troll account".

It will also probably mean more Bronze. Most seasons before this one, there were more SIlver than Bronze players on most servers. Now the rankings seem to more like a Pyramid (with Bronze being the majority worldwide). Interesting to keep tabs on it.
You filthy casuals take a month to get to 30?
